questions_and_answers.question: What should you do if someone is experiencing severe bleeding?
options: A. Leave it until professional medical aid arrives.
B. Apply pressure to the wound and raise the injured part above the level of the body if possible.
C. Wash the wound with water immediately.
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: B. Apply pressure to the wound and raise the injured part above the level of the body if possible.

questions_and_answers.question: How should you handle a victim who has just received an electric shock?
options: A. Pull the person off the conductor with your bare hands.
B. Leave the person till professional help arrives.
C. Use dry non-conducting materials such as a wooden bar, rope, or a scarf to remove the victim from contact with the live conductor.
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Use dry non-conducting materials such as a wooden bar, rope, or a scarf to remove the victim from contact with the live conductor.
